apiDesc.p: A container for 0..n Parameter Sets. Can be seen as a "row" or "record" of information, with its own 32 bit Id to be used as a key to the set if required

cxxFunctionDefinition.cxxFunctionPrototype: static IMPORT_C CParameterSetContainer * NewL(CParameterBundleBase &aBundle, TUint32 aContainerId=0)

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Bundle that this container is to be added to
identifier for the specific container instance

apiDesc.p: Creates a new parameter set container. This class is used as a container for a number of parameter sets (generic and extension) that are associated with each other. It is a specific instantiatable class and therefore creates an instance of CParameterSetContainer without using ECOM.
a pointer to a parameter set container if successful, otherwise leaves with system error code.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Bundle that this container is to be added to
Buffer containing the serialised object information

apiDesc.p: Creates a new parameter set container from a buffer containing the serialised object.
a pointer to a parameter set container if successful, otherwise leaves with system error code.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: identifier for the specific container instance

apiDesc.p: Creates a new parameter set container. This class is used as a container for a number of parameter sets (generic and extension) that are associated with each other. It is a specific instantiatable class and therefore creates an instance of CParameterSetContainer without using ECOM.
a pointer to a parameter set container if successful, otherwise leaves with system error code.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Buffer containing the serialised object information

apiDesc.p: Creates a new parameter set container from a buffer containing the serialised object.
a pointer to a parameter set container if successful, otherwise leaves with system error code.
Searches a container for a parameter set of the given type. Pointer to the set if found, otherwise a NULL pointer.
Searches a parameter set container for a parameter set. Pointer to the set if found, otherwise a NULL pointer.

cxxFunctionDefinition.cxxFunctionPrototype: inline const XParameterSetBase * FindParameterSet(const Meta::STypeId &aSetId) const

apiDesc.p: Searches a container for a specific parameter set instance. ETrue if set was found in parameter set container.
Searches a parameter set container for a parameter set. Pointer to the set if found, otherwise a NULL pointer.

cxxFunctionDefinition.cxxFunctionPrototype: inline const XParameterSetBase * GetParameterSet(TInt aIndex) const

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: - index of container to delete and replace

apiDesc.p: Deletes set at index aIndex and replaces it with aParameterSet. Ownership of set passes to this parameter set container. throws KErrArgument if aIndex out of range

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: - index of container to delete and remove from array

apiDesc.p: Deletes set at index, and reorganises the array so it's 1 smaller throws KErrArgument if aIndex out of range

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: - index of container to delete and remove from array

apiDesc.p: Removes the parameter set at the index. Ownership is transfered to the calling method returns NULL if the index was invalid, otherwise a pointer to the removed parameter set.
Makes room for a bulk setting operation

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Buffer containing the serialised container object

apiDesc.p: Instructs this container to set its members based on the serialised data in the buffer passed.
KErrNone if successful, otherwise system wide error
Instructs this container to create a serialised version of itself and append it to the buffer that has been passed.
KErrNone if successful, otherwise system wide error (e.g. KErrOverflow if the descriptor is too small) If unsuccessful, there is no guarantee as to the buffer or data stored in it.
Calculates the length of buffer required to serialise this parameter set container. Length of buffer required.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Bundle (parent container) that this new parameter set container is to be added to

apiDesc.p: Set up the container with empty sets
